name: Hatlan Autocracy
startIntroPart1: The descendant nation of the great Hatlan Empire, the Hatlan Autocracy carries forth the hefty legacy brought to them by their past.
startIntroPart2: Make haste, and strive for nothing less than absolutes!
declaringWar: You are now enemy of the empire!
attacked: We go to war then, in all honesty!
defeated: It would seem...that my empire was not to be...
neutralLetsHearIt: I will hear what you say.
neutralNo: Sorry, but i do not see a need
hateHello: I am tempted to lead you out the door right this instant.
hateNo: What? No chance in the world!
hateYes: You are lucky that I accept!
afterPeace: We are at peace now, yes?
